basic_info.name: GIET Engineering College Courses
description: There are various courses are being offered by the college since its inception. GIET Engineering College offers an entire range of B.Tech courses having a duration of 4 years or 8 semesters in seven specializations with different annual intakes such as Automobile Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Mining Engineering. Apart from that, 2 year or 4-semester full-time M.Tech courses are also offered by the college in different specializations such as CAD/CAM, C.S.E., Power Systems, VLSI Embedded Systems and many more. Some other PG programs also provided by the college having different eligibility conditions such as MCA, MBA. One should choose any corresponding program and its specialization according to the interest and eligibility criteria.
Get more info: GIET College of Engineering Fee Structure

basic_info.name: GIET Engineering College Placements
description: The Training & Placement is the full-fledged and well-equipped cell in term of placements which makes it the best among placement in the engineering college in the state of Andhra Pradesh. It is an integral part of the college that keeps a relationship with the corporate world and provide them the best of the professional students for their reputed jobs in the engineering sector.

The cell also arranges the training & internship programs for the students where the students get the chance to learn & grow with the job opportunities there. The cell also organizes various seminars and workshops with the help of experts such as mock interview drills, personality development sessions, group discussions sessions, soft skill seminars, computer language workshops, etc for the all-round development of the students.
In the year 2018-19, a total of 410 selections have been made in campus placements.
Prominent Recruiters: Microsoft, Virtusa, Infosys, Oracle, Wipro, LG Soft India, Axis Bank, Tech Mahindra, Polaris, ICICI Bank, HCL and many more.
To know more, click GIET College Placement

Section.name: About GIET Engineering College, Rajahmundhry
Section.description:
GIET Engineering College, is a Private College which was established in the year 1998 and located in the serene and sylvan suburbs region of Rajahmundhry of East Godavari City of Andhra Pradesh. It is a premier engineering college in the state of Andhra Pradesh with world-class education standards. Sprawling in the huge 300 acres of lush green environment, GIET campus reflects the finest educational facilities around. The college is ISO Certified, NBA-accredited, NAAC ‘A’ grade accredited and many other distinctions as well to add charm to GIET campus’ glory.
Establishment
1998
Type of College
Private College
Affiliation
Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada
Approvals & Accreditations
AICTE, NBA-accredited, NAAC ‘C’ accredited
Recognitions
Campus
300 acres
Location
NH-16, Velugubanda (V), Rajanagaram (M), East Godavari Dist. East Godavari - 533294 Andhra Pradesh, India
There are various courses are being offered by the college since its inception. GIET Engineering College offers an entire range of B.Tech courses having a duration of 4 years or 8 semesters in seven specializations with different annual intakes such as Automobile Engineering, Civil Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Mining Engineering. Apart from that, 2 year or 4-semester full-time M.Tech courses are also offered by the college in different specializations such as CAD/CAM, C.S.E., Power Systems, VLSI Embedded Systems and many more. Some other PG programs also provided by the college having different eligibility conditions such as MCA, MBA. One should choose any corresponding program and its specialization according to the interest and eligibility criteria.
Get more info: GIET College of Engineering Fee Structure
GIET Engineering College AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
The Training & Placement is the full-fledged and well-equipped cell in term of placements which makes it the best among placement in the engineering college in the state of Andhra Pradesh. It is an integral part of the college that keeps a relationship with the corporate world and provide them the best of the professional students for their reputed jobs in the engineering sector.
The cell also arranges the training & internship programs for the students where the students get the chance to learn & grow with the job opportunities there. The cell also organizes various seminars and workshops with the help of experts such as mock interview drills, personality development sessions, group discussions sessions, soft skill seminars, computer language workshops, etc for the all-round development of the students.
In the year 2018-19, a total of 410 selections have been made in campus placements.
